divs: Sighting DetailsI was playing in the snow during my time in north sweden in middle of a montainand i just fellt for watching the sky and all the sudden i saw a rounddiskyshape object with light bluewhite all around it allmost like it was all lightand it just passed very very fast maybe 500-1000 meters above my head and itlooked like it crashedlandeddisapeared 3-4 kilometers away in middle of thejungle allthough i did not heard or see it doing this.... i was very surprisedto see this object and thats all.Another time 11 years later i was standing near my house whatching the stars andit was a beutifulclear sky full of stars but one star atarted to move slowly ina zik zak movement and it moved so it came close to another star and it suddenlystopped and after few seconds it started to move in another dirrection andsuddenly it looked like it dissapeared in the dirrection into the space and itwas gone thats all and i can sE4g that this time i was very excited about this happening because this starobject moved unlike anything ellse i had ever seen beforethank you for leting me sharing my experience.
